name: Range Community Clinic - COVID Vaccine Clinic

name: Pliable, LLC Covid-19 Vaccine Site
address: Neighborhood House High Point | 6400 sylvan way SW, seattle wa, 98126
info:
We warmly welcome you to Pliable’s mobile COVID-19 *PFIZER* vaccination clinic!

Pliable LLC is a nurse practitioner-led organization for mindfully-driven healthcare. In alignment with Washington State Department of Health’s (DOH) equitable COVID-19 vaccine distribution strategies, our goal is to equitably and compassionately serve those communities disproportionately impacted by COVID-19 and help fill in vaccine access gaps.

This vaccination event is ONLY administering the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine. This is a two-dose vaccination series. 

**This clinic is for 1st or 2nd doses**

Please read the CDC and WA DOH information regarding COVID-19 Vaccinations and Pfizer-BioNTech and have your questions answered BEFORE REGISTERING. Resources can be found at: 
https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/Vaccine
https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/covid-19/info-by-product/pfizer/pfizer-bioNTech-faqs.html

The American Academy of Pediatrics’ Endorsement and Facts can be found at: 
https://www.aappublications.org/news/2021/05/12/cdc-aap-pfizer-covid-vaccine-teens-051221

You/Legal Guardian should have accessed and read the EUA fact sheet BEFORE REGISTERING. The Fact Sheet for this vaccination can be found at:
https://www.fda.gov/media/144414/download

For resources on side effects and post vaccination expectations:
https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/vaccines/expect/after.html 


By proceeding and scheduling online you are consenting to the following terms below as the patient or surrogate decision maker for the patient, including minors.
•	I certify that I am/my child is at least 12 years of age.
•	I understand it is not possible to predict all possible side effects or complications associated with receiving the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine.
•	I understand the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has authorized the emergency use of this vaccine, which is not an FDA approved vaccine in this patient population. I understand the nature, alternatives, benefits and risks of vaccination, to the extent they are known at this time. 
•	I am encouraged to sign up with v-safe: https://vsafe.cdc.gov/
•	I acknowledge that I have been advised to remain near the vaccination location for observation for 15 minutes after administration, 30 mins if I have a prior history of allergic reactions to vaccines.
•	I give my consent to Pliable LLC, including licensed employees, volunteers, and partners, to administer the Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine as described above.
•	I authorize and understand Pliable LLC may be required to or may voluntarily disclose my vaccine-related health information to my insurance plan, state or federal registries, and/or other public health authorities, for purposes of payment or health care operations.
•	I understand that I am not creating a patient relationship with Pliable LLC by participating in vaccination. I understand Pliable LLC is not acting as my medical provider. Vaccination does not replace treatment by my medical provider. I agree I will seek medical advice, care and treatment from a medical provider if I have questions or concerns, or if I experience side effects. 
•	I have been provided expectations for the day of my vaccination.
•	I acknowledge that I have read the Pfizer-BioNTech Fact Sheet and agree to these terms and conditions. 
Please note that for this vaccine, a recipient cannot have gotten another vaccination within 14 days or after the COVID-19 vaccine. 


On the day of your appointment: 
•	Registration and attestation serves as consent. Minors will NOT need to bring a formal signed parental consent on day of clinic.
•	Guardians are welcome to accompany should they wish to join their minor. This is NOT a requirement.   
•	Vaccination is available regardless of your citizenship or immigration status.
•	If you have insurance, please include this information during your online registration. Insurance is NOT required, you will not be billed, the vaccination is FREE TO ALL. Insurance will cover administrative costs if available. 
•	Wear a short-sleeved shirt or clothing that allows access to your upper arm. 
•	Masks are required at all times at the clinic. If you do not have a mask one will be provided to you.
•	Please arrive no earlier than 10 minutes prior to your scheduled appointment time. Appointment cannot be guaranteed if you arrive late.
•	Do not visit the site if you are experiencing symptoms of COVID-19 on the day of your appointment.

•	If you have a history of serious allergic reactions (anaphylaxis) and are prescribed an epinephrine auto injector (Epipen, etc) please bring this to your vaccination appointment and notify clinical staff. 

HAPPY VACCINATION DAY!
www.bepliable.com
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

info: ***2ND DOSE ONLY PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE SEGUNDA DOSIS ÚNICAMENTE PFIZER!!! Granger High School Vaccine Clinic. Masks are required. name: Hawker Center for Integrative Medicine - COVID Vaccine Clinic
address: 1750 112th Avenue Northeast, STE C-102, Bellevue WA, 98004
info:
At the Hawker Center, we provide a warm oasis of peace and comfort, treating our patients and their stories with patience and respect. Imagine a spa-like atmosphere where a highly-trained doctor or nurse is administrating the COVID19 vaccination. That’s the Hawker Center difference.
***We currently are providing the 1st and 2nd doses of MODERNA.*** Please sign up for an appointment time.  Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay for 15 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction.***If you would like to find out more information about our clinic, please visit our website at www.hawkerhealth.com***
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
info: ***1ST & 2nd DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS***!!!!VACUNAS DE PRIMERA Y SEGUNDA DOSIS PFIZER!!! The vaccination clinic will take place at the City of Yakima Public Works parking lot. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All individuals 12 and over are eligible to get vaccinated. Those under 18 must be accompanied by a parent/guardian or must get parental consent via video/phone call or paper format. La clínica de vacunación se ubicara en el parqueadero de City of Yakima Public Works. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todas las personas mayores de 12 años son elegibles para vacunarse. Los menores de 18 años deben estar acompañados por un padre/tutor o deben obtener el consentimiento de los padres por video/llamada telefónica o en papel.***1ST & 2nd DOSE PFIZER VACCINATIONS***!!!!VACUNAS DE PRIMERA Y SEGUNDA DOSIS PFIZER!!!
